data.title: Defender Spawn to B Site Blindside
data.description: This Blindside is useful for retaking B Site from CT Spawn and will flash the majority of the site.

data.title: A Screens To A Site Blindside
data.description: This Blindside is useful for flashing incoming players in A Main, giving you an opportunity to get some easy kills.

data.title: A Heaven To A Site Blindside
data.description: This Blindside is useful for flashing incoming players in A Site when A Heaven is smoked off.
